title: A font that looks a little like a Copper-plate (Angled edges) but which also has a shadow outline
content:
It's is the words CHOP SHOP that I would like to know the font for. It's quite possible this is bespoke typography, s it would also be good hear of fonts that are slightly similar. Many thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Chop Shop Label.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424032932/http:/typophile.com/files/Chop%20Shop%20Label.jpg) | 52.35 KB |
author: Rawshock Design

comments.content: Thanks Phillip. I assume the drop-line is something the designer added to the font in?
FYI: The designer on this project was Caleb Owen Everitt, now with [LAND](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424032932/http:/www.workbyland.com/).
